project_descr: PIMS 3527 - Capacity Building for PCB Elimination in Ghana

outputs.output_descr: Review, develop, and adopt legislation and policies. Enhanced technical capacity of public sector authorities for sound PCB management. Refined and updated inventory of PCB to increase its comprehensiveness. New administrative systems developed and implemented for PCB-related enforcement and inspection activities after inventory compilation Institutional and normative frameworks strengthened for the management of PCB throughout their life-cycle. Temporary storage facilities identified, constructed or upgraded

document_name: http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/GHA/00048699/PCB Management i n Ghana from capacity Building to elimination.pdf
project_title: pims 3527-capacity building for pcb elimination in ghana
